RAW.SOURCE:
*---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Include ZAPLINLK_TOP *---------------------------------------------------------------------* TABLES: sscrfields, e071.
TYPE-POOLS: icon, trwbo.
TYPES t_objlist TYPE zaplink_gui=>to_list. TYPES t_comp TYPE zaplink_gui=>to_component. types t_msg_col type zaplink_gui=>TO_MSG_COLL. TYPES t_exception TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx.
TYPES t_filename TYPE zaplink_gui=>td_filename. TYPES td_name TYPE zaplink_gui=>td_contname. TYPES t_obj_type TYPE zaplink_gui=>td_comptype. TYPES t_obj_name TYPE zaplink_gui=>td_compname. types td_devc_sk type ZAPLINK_OPT_DEVCLASS=>td_substitutionkind.
DATA is_selection TYPE trwbo_selection.
DATA objlist TYPE t_objlist. DATA d_filename TYPE t_filename. DATA d_name TYPE td_name. DATA obj_type TYPE t_obj_type. DATA obj_name TYPE t_obj_name. DATA o_exception TYPE t_exception.
